GLEIF Classified Dataset Partitions
===================================

This dataset has been partitioned into 5 files for GitHub compatibility:

Part 1: gleif_classified_part_1.parquet
Part 2: gleif_classified_part_2.parquet
Part 3: gleif_classified_part_3.parquet
Part 4: gleif_classified_part_4.parquet
Part 5: gleif_classified_part_5.parquet

Total companies: 3,078,018
Columns: LEI, Entity.LegalName, Entity.LegalAddress.Country, Entity.EntityCategory, Entity.EntitySubCategory, probably_metals_and_mining, probably_financial, probably_transportation, probably_automotive, probably_technology, probably_healthcare, probably_real_estate, probably_retail_consumer, probably_manufacturing

To load the full dataset, use GoodGleif with auto-partition loading.
